Package com.dumbdogdiner.stickyapi.bukkit.item

Class WrittenBookBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dumbdogdiner.stickyapi.bukkit.item.WrittenBookBuilder
  • public class WrittenBookBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows for easy construction of a Written Book, whether through JSON objects and manual creation, or by loading a full JSON object from a file or other source
    Since:
    TBA

    • Method Detail

      • fromJson

        @NotNull
public static @NotNull WrittenBookBuilder fromJson​(@NotNull
                                                   @NotNull com.google.gson.JsonObject bookObject)
        Creates a new BookGenerator from a given JsonObject, representing a book, which can be obtained in whatever way you want.
        Parameters:
        bookObject - A JSON object containing a JsonArray of valid Pages; If a Material.WRITTEN_BOOK is desired, it must contain a title, author, and optionally, a Generation (an integer with the value of 0, 1, 2, or 3, with 0 being the default)
        Returns:
        a WrittenBookBuilder with the specified pages; if a title and author are both specified, it will be a Material.WRITTEN_BOOK, otherwise it will be a Material.WRITABLE_BOOK

        @NotNull
public @NotNull WrittenBookBuilder addPages​(com.google.gson.JsonObject @NotNull ... pages)
        Add some pages to the book. May fail with IllegalStateException if the book is full or fills up.
        Parameters:
        pages - Pages to add
        Returns:
        This object, for chaining
